title: 3 and Out - Kenny Pickett Tiny Hands, Malik Willis Rising, Combine, Standouts, Eagles H-O-R-S-E Test, Amari Pay Cut, Trade Kyler, Russ Trade Talk
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Kenny Pickett Tiny Hands, Malik Willis Rising, Combine, Standouts, Eagles H-O-R-S-E Test, Amari Pay Cut, Trade Kyler, Russ Trade Talk
description:
John dive into the NFL Combine, including if Kenny Pickett's baby hands are a red flag or an overblown media creation, Malik Willis is the most intriguing prospect in the draft, and some of the standouts from the week. He also discusses the latest on Lamar Jackson's contract talks, why the Eagles playing H-O-R-S-E with draft prospects isn't as ridiculous as it sounds, why the Cowboys want Amari Cooper to take a pay cut, if the Cardinals should explore trading Kyler Murray, how a Russell Wilson trade could have a silver lining for Seattle, and the importance of having a media savvy GM in today's environment.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
